product_name: The North Face GTD Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With moisture-wicking, quick-drying FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD long-sleeve shirt boosts your comfort during cool-weather runs and high-energy workouts. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Polyester wicks away sweat; natural particles in fabric resist odors. Mesh panels at sides and arms promote cooling airflow where needed. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD long-sleeve shirt help keep you visible; fabric offers a UV-protective rating of UPF 15. Closeout.
short_description: With moisture-wicking, quick-drying FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD long-sleeve shirt boosts your comfort during cool-weather runs and high-energy workouts.
